description: Towards Greater Citizentry Participation in Swaziland

subproject.description:
1. Research conducted to assess the current level of human rights understanding in Swaziland and establish a baseline for future reference.
2. Targeted training material and modules on the constitution developed in Siswati, with particular focus on the Bill of Rights. 
3. Periodic training conducted for professional bodies, civil society organizations and security institutions on the Bill of Rights component of the 2005 Constitution.
4. National sensitization campaign on human rights is conducted, focusing on traditionally marginalised groups such as youth, women, people with disabilities and the elderly.
5. Strengthened capacity of the Media Institute of Southern Africa/Swaziland to conduct periodic training on the role of the media in building a human rights culture in Swaziland.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Towards Greater Citizentry Par
